name: Bipolar Heart
description:
@daiana_lazzarin
Series: Intervened Heart VI
Number of Works: 7
Artist: Daiana L. Lazzarin
Year 2012
Province: Mendoza
Country: Argentina 
Technique: Digital Art
Description: Daiana Lazzarin, participated with 7 hearts, in the Intervened Heart Mail Art Show, a collective exhibition, based on the free intervention of the image of a heart. Inaugurated on December 1, 2012, at 1:00 p.m., at the Gral. Gutiérrez Popular Library (Carril Gómez 35, Maipú, Mendoza. Argentina).
